questionList.question: What is a bonus?
questionList.answer: Bonuses are additional money added to your balance. It gives you an advantage and increases your chances of winning bigger amounts. But you should remember that the bonus size depends on the promotional offer's terms. So don't forget to check out our promotions and mindfully read the offer's terms.

questionList.question: How can I find out what the bonus wager is?
questionList.answer: Just go to your personal profile. There you can find all the information about active bonuses. And if you need any help you can always text to our support.

questionList.question: How can I get my welcome bonus?
questionList.answer: The bonus will be automatically credited as soon as you make the deposit.

questionList.question: How many times do I need to wager my bonus?
questionList.answer: All deposit-related bonuses have a x45 wagering requirement. For more information, please visit our [Bonus Terms Page.](https://slotsbet.io/bonus-terms)

questionList.question: I got my bonus, but the required bonus wager isn't decreasing. Why?
questionList.answer: Different casino games contribute differently to the wagering requirement. [On the Bonus Terms Page](https://slotsbet.io/bonus-terms) you can read more information about bonus wager.
